name: Tron3D
description:
This is a very small game where you compete with ai enemies trying to survive in the arena. The goal is to block the paths of other cubes until you are the last one standing.

Controls are W, A, S, D. If controls don't work on the first play. restart the game and they should work.  

Any and all feedback is welcome.

Looking for specific advice on:

  • Movement controls - ability to slow down/speed up? different directional controls?
  • UI - start menu? settings?
  • Camera - different camera angle? should the camera follow the player? first person?
